data.news_body: We would like to inform you that we have observed a typographical error in the Cash Flow of the for the half year ended September 30,2023 for which the revised results is attached herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Today I.E. November 1, 2021
data.news_body: we hereby inform you that Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on today i.e. November 1, 2021 approved Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2021, Adoption of the Dividend Distribution Policy in terms of Regulation 43A of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 and Declaration of Interim Dividend of Rs.1.40 i.e. 14% on the face value of Rs.10/- per share for the financial year 2021-22.
